reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shirt fits well, particularly noting it's great for broad shoulders, and appreciate its style and quality. Customers disagree on whether it's worth the price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tall Women read!
items.body: I’m 5’11” and this dress is definitely on the shorter side! If you’re a tall girly, you can totally make it work, but I recommend pairing it with tights or leggings. I tried it three ways—once with patterned tights, once with fleece winter tights, and once with no tights at all. Without tights, it’s cute but risky—you’ll 100% want to wear panties because this dress can flash someone if you’re not careful. That being said, I love it! I styled it as if I were going out for a girls’ night in the city, and it looked beautiful. The fit is true to size—I got a Large, and for reference I’m 5’11” and 190 lbs. Just a heads-up: if I raise my arms, my butt does peek out a little, but with tights or leggings, it’s totally fine. Overall, I’d say definitely get this dress and style it in a way that works for you. It’s flattering, fun, and can easily be dressed up or down. If you are shorter I’m sure with panties you can get away with wearing it by itself. But for anyone that is tall or curvy keep in mind the fabric will ride up. I highly recommend using a waist belt it keeps the fabric in place. It is amazing! I can’t wait to wear this fit! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looks great on
items.body: I don't have big bust but small works I'm 5'2 36 C / cup haven't worn yet my neice love her shirt I bought two Read more
items.author: Sherree Bonner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not tru to size. Very small, so buy size up!
items.body: Nice but the size is not true to size. Buy bigger! Read more
items.author: rcpetty16

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn't look right on my body
items.body: I didn't like the flap part in the front it didn't lay down correctly maybe almost appeared crooked like. I was hoping I could roll up the sleeve 3/4 above the elbow and I couldn't...well it kinda did but it still flipped down...idk I wasn't feeling it on my body. Some of the pictures I saw on this, The women styled it really good. But I gotta feel comfortable in it and it just didn't look right on me. I am returning it ...not a fan at all ...I think the back makes you feel like you have nothing on so it gives sexy, then when you turn around it's confusing and gives office...idk that's what it gives when I was looking at it in the mirror. Don't let that black girl fool you. SWIPE LEFT !! On the black girl it seems like there are no buttons at the top, but once you swipe you see the button on the next slide. I think if it had a open top part automatically it would be nice...I think. Idk I just know I'm not wearing it on my trip at all and now I gotta go to the damn mall !!! Read more
items.author: Shari Stevens

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tight in the waist
items.body: Nice light weighted shirt -however super small in the waist section for me Read more
items.author: Camille

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Interesting style
items.body: Runs tight around the breasts creating a small gap between the 2 buttons on that area. Im 34 B and ordered Medium size. Slim fit on torso but not restrictive, nice fit. Material is great quality though. Arms length can be a bit long but if you fold the cuffs look great too. Read more
items.author: C. Aguirre

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long sleeves
items.body: Going to use on a cruise I like how it hangs over my hips. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Feliz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Many ways to wear this beautiful shirt.
items.body: Beautiful Color bright red nice quality and true to size. Read more
items.author: Sparkle

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Grass Green, Khaki Print, Peacock Green, Rose, Black, Ginger, Light Wine, Off White Stirped, Orange, Beige, Pure Red, Royal Blue, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
